main event: On July 3, 1966, a civilian reported seeing one unidentified flying object in Bloomington, Indiana for approximately 5 minutes.
interesting points: The witness initially thought it was an airplane descending for landing,It was speculated that the object might have been larger and brighter than the lights on a nearby tower,The witness described the object as having a predominantly white color with small red and green lights,There was no physical evidence of the object found after it went down behind trees,The witness recorded a detailed sketch but noted it was difficult to determine the object's shape due to its brightness.
witness description: The witness is a 27-year-old female with a good deal of experience relating to various flying objects and has been working on a doctorate.
